Text: RE Louise Kitchens Calendar Inbox and Contacts Cc Liz Ive granted you access as requested I did notice that there were a few others listed to have access to Louise mail Ill delete those names Original Message From Taylor Liz Sent Friday February AM To Pardillo Joy Cc Kitchen Louise Schoppe Tammie Buckman Robert Subject Louise Kitchens Calendar Inbox and Contacts Hi Joy Louise Kitchen has requested me to have access to her calendar contacts and Inbox I need to have the ability to create delete and edit appoints in her calendar I need to be able to review and reply to emails on her behalf Louise wants to confirm that only Tammie Schoppe and myself have access to her calendar contacts and inbox Please do a thorough search to be sure no one else can view her information including those in the London office Call me should you have any questions Many Thanks Liz Taylor x Executive Assistant to Greg Whalley Enron Corp
